english.segment1: Take my rage. Hide it in your fists. It's all for you. It's all I can do.
english.segment2: And believe me when I say, That I'll pay you back some day, When you're standing all alone, With nothing of your own.
english.segment3: Bury my burdens. Have fun controlling me.
english.segment4: Cast all my cares upon, Your weary shoulders. Heed my words to you. Because what I say is true. This is something we discussed. I want the best for us.
english.segment5: Reaching out, desperately. Broken dreams, you and me. Reaching out, tragically. Dead beliefs, you and me.
english.segment6: Now my pain is gone. The pain is gone. I'm moving on.
